links.*: The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion
The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)
The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
The Lord of the Rings (film series)

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==February==
* '''[[5 February|5]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 123]].
* '''[[24 February|24]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 124]].
* '''[[28 February|28]]''' - Artist [[Roger Garland]] is born.

==March==
* '''[[6 March|6]]''' - [[Stanley Unwin]] writes to Tolkien about dividing the ''Lord of the Rings'' in volumes; he also reports that ''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]'' had not sold as well as hoped.<ref>{{HM|L}}, p. 138</ref>
* '''[[10 March|10]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes letters [[Letter 125|125]] and [[Letter 126|126]].
* '''[[10 March|10]]''' - [[Stephen Oliver]] is born.
* '''[[18 March|18]]''' - [[Brad Dourif]], who would play [[Gríma|Gríma Wormtongue]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]], is born.

== April ==
* '''[[3 April|3]]''' - Stanley Unwin writes to Tolkien considering again the cost for printing and the problem of publishing ''Lord of the Rings''.<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. xxix</ref><ref>{{B|VI}}, p. 210</ref>
* '''[[14 April|14]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 127]] presenting an ultimatum to Unwin about publishing ''[[Silmarillion]]'' with the ''Lord of the Rings''.
* '''[[17 April|17]]''' - Stanley Unwin writes to Tolkien, refusing to publish the ''Silmarillion'' without checking the final work.<ref>{{HM|L}}, p. 141</ref>
* '''?''' - After Stanley Unwin's refusal of publishing the [[The Lord of the Rings]], Professor Tolkien went to [[Milton Waldman]], but was turned down again, because he felt they were too long.
==May==
* '''[[May]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] moves into [[99 Holywell Street]].
== July ==
* '''[[19 July|19]]''' - [[Simon Cadell]], voice actor who portrayed [[Celeborn]] in the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings 1981 radio series]] is born.
==August==
* '''[[1 August|1]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 128]].
==September==
* '''[[4 September|4]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 128a]].
* '''[[10 September|10]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 129]].
* '''[[14 September|14]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 130]].
==October==
* '''[[9 October|9]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 130a]].
==November==
* '''[[4 November|4]]''' - [[John Vickery]], who would play several roles in [[The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1979 radio series)]], is born.
* '''[[22 November|22]]''' - Artist [[David T. Wenzel]] is born.
==?==
*'''?''' - Tolkien works on ''[[The Lay of Leithian Recommenced]]''.
